title: Exercise Regularly
description: Physical activity helps reduce stress and improve mood.

title: Get Enough Sleep
description: A good night's sleep is essential for mental health.

title: Practice Mindfulness
description: Mindfulness techniques can help reduce anxiety and improve focus.

title: Stay Hydrated
description: Drinking enough water is crucial for mental and physical health.

title: Eat Nutritious Foods
description: Balanced nutrition can positively affect mental clarity and energy levels.
